description: Genetic algorithmbased inverse design framework for discovering double perovskite oxides with target band gaps for photovoltaic applications. Integrates DFT-informed machine learning as a fast surrogate and validates top candidates using first-principles DFT calculations.
Machine learning framework for Enterococcus cecorum pathogenicity prediction (Antimicrobial Resistance + genomic islands + pangenome)

This repository provides a reproducible Python framework for benchmarking eight hyperparameter optimization methods (GS, RS, TPE, GP, HB, CMA-ES, AGA, RCGA) across four tree-based machine learning models (Decision Tree, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, and XGBoost) for hourly agricultural reservoir water-level prediction.

A growing collection of machine learning concepts implemented from scratch, including neural networks, optimizers, loss functions, and training dynamics. The goal is to build first-principles intuition by reconstructing core algorithms without relying on high-level frameworks.
Machine learning framework

This project is a Python-based malware analysis framework that performs both static and dynamic analysis on files. It integrates feature extraction, machine learning-based classification, and dynamic behavior analysis to detect and classify files as malicious or benign.
Two-stage machine learning framework for predicting video game critic and user ratings using pre- and post-release features
Python Fast Dataflow programming  framework for Data pipeline work( Web Crawler,Machine Learning,Quantitative Trading.etc)
An efffcient privacypreserving  framework designed to mitigate communication bottlenecks in distributed machine learning.
A framework for conducting machine learning experiments in python

An automated machine learning (AutoML) framework using Genetic Algorithms to optimize complex pipelines (preprocessing, imbalanced handling, and hyperparameter tuning) for semiconductor manufacturing data.
A comprehensive platform for automated evaluation of AI agent responses using multi-metric analysis, built with React TypeScript frontend and Python backend with machine learning capabilities.
Buildling a Neural network from scratch without using any machine learning framework like pyTorch and Tensorflow

This project implements a complete quantitative research pipeline for mining, combining, and evaluating alpha factors. It covers the entire lifecycle from data simulation and feature engineering to machine learning optimization (Elastic Net) and rigorous performance testing (Quantile Backtesting, IC Analysis, and Factor Decay).
Advanced Machine Learning framework for detecting market inefficiencies in football odds (2000-2025). Focus on ROI, probability calibration, and algorithmic betting strategies using Python.

GLA BUILDER is a local, naturallanguage software builder that creates websites, applications, and digital tools endtoend. It runs per machine, integrates frameworks like Node.js, Rust, and Python, and features persistent memory, selflearning, and stressfree automation.
A Python-based machine learning framework for real-time voice-to-text and text-to-voice conversion using modern speech processing technologies.
Astronomical machine learning framework with advanced data analysis and interactive 3D visualization capabilities.

AI-driven framework combining clinical rules with machine learning (Logistic Regression, Random Forest, XGBoost) using NFHS and global datasets to predict maternal health risks. Integrates explainable AI and feature selection for transparent, data-informed, and clinically aligned risk assessment.

A data-driven modeling and backtesting framework for NFL quarterback passing yards props. The project applies traditional machine-learning techniques and contextual feature engineering to estimate expected passing yards and evaluate sportsbook prop lines, with performance assessed using realistic historical backtesting.

A from-scratch Machine Learning reviewer library focused on understanding the math behind the code. Built as a learning project featuring custom implementations of core algorithms, gradient descent, and model evaluation without relying heavily on high-level ML frameworks.

ML-Potion is all about crafting your own machine-learning elixir using the ingredients and frameworks you prefer. Think of the library as a set of building blocksatoms, steps, and componentsthat you can mix, match, and sequence to build a fully customized training or inference pipeline.
Code base for: A unified framework for evaluating robustness of Machine Learning Interpretability for Prospect Risking
Foam-Agent: An end-to-end, composable multi-agent framework for automating CFD simulations in OpenFOAM. NeurIPS 2025 Machine Learning and the Physical Sciences Workshop.
A comprehensive machine learning framework for quantitative trading strategies
Foundational AI for Ambient Systems  from classical machine learning to modern generative AI frameworks. Includes models, deployment examples, and applications.

A comprehensive machine learning pipeline for seizure detection and classification using pose-based video analysis. This project implements a complete k-fold cross-validation workflow using MMAction2 framework with STGCN (Spatial-Temporal Graph Convolutional Networks) for temporal action recognition.

Cyber Shield is an AI-driven cybersecurity framework that detects network intrusions, phishing emails, and insider threats using machine learning models. It combines Random Forest, LightGBM, and NLP techniques with SHAP & LIME to provide accurate and explainable threat detection. The system helps security analysts identify and understand attack
Advanced Machine Learning Framework for Forecasting Air Pollution in Delhi (2025-2030) using Hybrid Deep Learning Architecture

TensorFlow is an open-source deep learning framework developed by Google. It helps build, train, and deploy machine-learning models using tensors and data-flow graphs. TensorFlow supports neural networks, GPU/TPU acceleration, automatic differentiation, and is widely used in AI applications like image recognition and NLP
Transformers: the model-definition framework for state-of-the-art machine learning models in text, vision, audio, and multimodal models, for both inference and training.

Agentic AI framework for predictive maintenance in energy systems, integrating LoRA-adapted language models, time-series machine learning, and MLOps to enable autonomous, drift-aware decision-making using public datasets.

A machine learning framework for detecting and classifying gold mineralization levels from geochemical datasets. The project evaluates tree-based ensemble models under class imbalance and emphasizes recall-driven, decision-supportoriented evaluation rather than accuracy-only prediction.

An end-to-end Business Analytics project built with Python, integrating data cleaning, outlier detection, customer segmentation using K-Means, and an interactive Streamlit dashboard to transform raw data into actionable business insights.

This repo features the code, input and output files for my undergraduate thesis titled "Design and optimization of an integrated computational and machine learning framework to detect functional variants and elucidate their contributions to biological pathways".

NeuraOrchestra is an AI training orchestration platform that streamlines the deployment and management of machine learning workflows. It provides a unified interface for training, monitoring, and optimizing AI models across diverse frameworks and datasets.

Causal analysis framework using Double Machine Learning to quantitatively isolate the effect of model size on deep learning performance while controlling for confounders such as dataset size, training time, and hyperparameters.

Forest Fire Prediction is a Supervised Machine learning problem statements. Using Regression and Classification Algorithm, Regression and Classification Model is build that detected future fires based on certain Weather report.  A framework is created using Flask and deployed on Render

flowMagic is an R package for automated bivariate gating of flow cytometry (FCM) data. It uses a machine-learning model trained on both experts data and a large, high-quality FCM dataset generated by EVE Online players. The package also provides an extensive visualization toolkit and integrates seamlessly with the flowCore/flowWorkspace frameworks
A real-time machine learning framework for detecting Command & Control (C2) traffic and data exfiltration over Tailscale DERP relays.
Build and deploy machine learning models with Pontos, an efficient framework that simplifies workflows using Python, PyTorch, and Docker.

This project is an AI-powered Digital Forensic Investigation Framework designed to detect anomalies in marine navigation systems. It leverages Python and Machine Learning for anomaly detection (such as GPS spoofing) and integrates Blockchain technology to ensure secure, tamper-proof storage of digital evidence.

This project involves a dynamic multi-lane traffic signal optimization framework that integrates deep learningbased vehicle detection using YOLOv8 with a RandomForest machine learning classifier for traffic density estimation.

QuoreMindHP v1.0.0 es un framework robusto y sofisticado que combina machine learning clsico con anlisis estadstico de ultra-alta precisin. Su arquitectura modular permite extensiones fciles y mantenimiento sostenible. Ideal para aplicaciones que requieren precisin numrica excepcional combinada con poder predictivo del aprendizaje automtico
A dual-stage Machine Learning framework for customer income prediction and strategic segmentation using US Census data.
An end-to-end machine learning pipeline for predicting football match outcomes, integrating statistical modeling (Poisson Distribution) with ensemble learning (XGBoost, LightGBM).

Truth in Listings is a hybrid AI framework that detects fraudulent real estate data by combining machine learning, NLP, image analysis, and rule-based validation. It verifies prices, descriptions, images, and locations to flag fake or misleading listings, improving transparency, trust, and user safety on property platforms globally online
Physics-guided machine learning framework for evaporation rate prediction under mixed and forced convection, including dataset and source code.
A sophisticated machine learning framework for predicting football match outcomes using ELO ratings, statistical modeling, and hybrid feature engineering.

An end-to-end technical repository featuring hands-on notebooks across the full AI stack: Statistics, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, GenAI, and Agentic frameworks. Focused on 2026 industry standards, this collection bridges the gap between fundamental revision and experimental AI development.

MetaMorph is an open-source framework that leverages the power of Large Language Models (LLMs) to process, extract, and transform messy, unstructured, or heterogeneous columns of metadata into structured, machine-readable formats to enhance machine learning pipelines and predictive models across any domain.
A dependently-typed machine learning framework for Lean 4, providing compile-time tensor shape verification.

The PennyLane-Qrack plugin integrates the Qrack quantum computing framework with PennyLane's quantum machine learning capabilities.
Adaptive AutoML framework for automated machine learning pipeline optimization with meta-learning capabilities.

Projects in this repository demonstrate the full machine learning workflow, including data preprocessing, model design, mathematical formulation of models, training, evaluation, and analysis, with implementations written from scratch or using standard ML frameworks.

Ensemble deep learning and classical machine learning framework for phishing URL detection, including feature engineering, cross-validation, and statistical evaluation.

"A machine learning framework for the automated detection and localization of sensor anomalies in commercial aircraft, leveraging the NASA DASHlink aviation dataset for enhanced flight safety and predictive maintenance."
Open source machine learning framework to automate text- and voice-based conversations: NLU, dialogue management, connect to Slack, Facebook, and more - Create chatbots and voice assistants

Adaptive forecasting of non-stationary, heterogeneous time series is addressed through a validation-driven framework that blends global, cluster-aware, and selective personalized models. Emphasizing robustness, it constrains extreme errors via regime awareness and conservative fallback, favoring reliability over marginal average gains.

Enhanced early-stage fairness analysis in machine learning by developing deep learning models and advanced word embeddings to classify sensitive features from user stories, improving accuracy and contextual understanding over existing frameworks like ReFair.

A Machine Learning framework for discovering and characterizing scenarios from trajectory datasets into different interaction types by combining state-of-the-art trajectory forecasting and embedding quantization techniques.

Here I developed a Python framework for ML-driven risk modeling using Restricted Boltzmann Machines (RBMs) for probability distribution learning, Monte Carlo simulations for scenario testing, and advanced statistical techniques to evaluate loan default risk and portfolio losses. RECLAIM (Reservoir Estimation of Capacity Loss using AI-based Methods) is a globally scalable machine learning framework to predict absolute sedimentation rates using observed records and multi-decadal Earth observations from satellite data.
Demand forecasting and dynamic pricing decision-support framework using statistical, machine-learning, and ensemble models.
A framework for developing multi-scale arrays for use in scientific machine learning (SciML) simulations

An acausal modeling framework for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML) in Julia. A computer algebra system for integrated symbolics for physics-informed machine learning and automated transformations of differential equations

Developed a hybrid MLCNN framework for automated skin lesion classification using dermoscopic images from the ISIC 2024 Skin Lesion Classification Challenge dataset, leveraging ResNet-50 feature extraction and traditional machine learning models to improve diagnostic accuracy and reduce false negatives.

PanARGMiner: Pan-genomic Antimicrobial Resistance Gene Miner is a machine learning framework for selecting key antimicrobial resistance features from large-scale genomic data with high accuracy and interpretability.
Anvil is a high-performance machine learning framework written in Rust, designed from the ground up for speed, parallelism, and control.
A topological machine learning framework based on PyTorch
A machine learning framework to predict loan default risk using alternative borrower data, designed for underserved financial segments.

HackGPT Enterprise is a production-ready, cloud-native AI-powered penetration testing platform designed for enterprise security teams. It combines advanced AI, machine learning, microservices architecture, and comprehensive security frameworks to deliver professional-grade cybersecurity assessments.

sm2rain_hydroai is an AI-enhanced SM2RAIN framework for estimating rainfall from satellite soil moisture. It combines physical inversion with machine learning and deep learning to improve rainfall reconstruction, extreme event monitoring, and hydrologic analysis across climates and regions.

This project presents a physics-inspired spacecraft telemetry simulation and anomaly detection framework that models power, thermal, and communication subsystems in Low Earth Orbit. It combines engineering-based thresholds and machine learning to analyze synthetic telemetry and study fault detection and spacecraft health monitoring.
Custom made machine learning library with various test. Only uses numpy for faster calculations

A curated collection of high-quality learning materials, research papers, datasets, frameworks, and practical guides covering every major area of Artificial Intelligence  including Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Computer Vision, Generative AI, Reinforcement Learning, and MLOps.

This project builds a machine learning framework to improve loan default prediction by combining traditional credit attributes with real-world transaction behavior. Instead of treating borrowers as static profiles, the model captures dynamic financial patterns such as spending volatility, activity frequency, and temporal behavioral shifts.
An open-source Python framework for hybrid quantum-classical machine learning.
A hybrid digital twin framework that combines physics-based modeling and machine learning to accurately predict Li-ion battery performance and degradation over time.

Predicts customer churn and converts risk scores into actionable retention decisions. The project uses a machine learning model and a cost-benefit framework to select the optimal action threshold based on campaign cost and customer value, enabling targeted interventions and improved retention ROI.
